entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who is speaking to Harry Potter. He is described as having a 'silkily' tone and sneering at Harry.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is a title given to Voldemort, but it is not explicitly mentioned in the text. However, Snape mentions speaking to him, implying that he is referring to Voldemort.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is a person who is present with Harry Potter and Snape. He is described as hesitating and then leaving the room.

relationships.description: Snape mentions speaking to the Dark Lord, implying that he has a relationship with him.
Wormtail is instructed by Snape to bring drinks, indicating that Wormtail is subordinate to Snape.
